fs-orphanedperms.description: Lists folders with permissions for deleted permissions
fs-orphanedperms.Query: MATCH p=(:AD_Deleted)-[]->(:FS_Folder) MATCH q=(:Orphaned)-[]->(:FS_Folder) WITH nodes(p)+nodes(q) AS items UNWIND items as item RETURN DISTINCT item

fs-inheritancedisabled.description: Lists folders with inherited permissions disabled
fs-inheritancedisabled.Query: MATCH (n:FS_Folder) WHERE n.inheritancedisabled=True return n ORDER BY n.path

GIVES_ACCESS_TO.description: Applies permission to an object in the filesystem

FS_Datastore.description: Datastore that contains one or more file systems

FS_Folder.description: A folder in a file system

blocked.description: Scanner was unable to interogate this folder and further scanning was blocked
